description: Exploring the lush Dartmouth College campus with friendly mascot-themed characters
Getting lost in the labyrinthine libraries of Dartmouth College and trying to find their way back to their dorms
Students at Dartmouth College procrastinating their assignments and opting to organize a gaming tournament instead
Having a thrilling day at Dartmouth College's campus and discovering it's the best educational theme park in the world
Camping near Dartmouth College's beautiful forested areas, hearing mysterious sounds, and embarking on a Dartmouth-themed investigation
